channel.title: Tianhao Wei's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Tianhao Wei's Personal Page

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: In this theme we will be using MathJax 2.7 To enable MathJax globally set the parameter math to true in a project’s configuration To enable MathJax on a per page basis include the parameter math: true in content files Note: Use the online reference of MathJax TeX and LaTeX Support Examples Inline math: $\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦$ Block math: $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
